name: CIS Controls v8
description: Center for Internet Security Critical Security Controls Version 8

deliverables.title: CIS 1 - Enterprise Asset Inventory
deliverables.description: Actively manage hardware assets on the network
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM hosts

deliverables.title: CIS 2 - Software Asset Inventory
deliverables.description: Actively manage software assets and versions
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM services WHERE version IS NOT NULL

deliverables.title: CIS 3 - Data Protection
deliverables.description: Test data protection controls including encryption
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%encryption%' OR title LIKE '%data protection%'

deliverables.title: CIS 4 - Secure Configuration
deliverables.description: Establish secure configurations for enterprise assets
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%misconfiguration%' OR title LIKE '%default%' OR title LIKE '%hardening%'

deliverables.title: CIS 5 - Account Management
deliverables.description: Test account management processes and credential policies
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM credentials

deliverables.title: CIS 6 - Access Control Management
deliverables.description: Test access control mechanisms and privilege management
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%access control%' OR title LIKE '%privilege%'

deliverables.title: CIS 7 - Continuous Vulnerability Management
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings

deliverables.title: CIS 8 - Audit Log Management
deliverables.description: Test audit log collection, alerting, and review

deliverables.title: CIS 9 - Email and Browser Protections
deliverables.description: Test email and web browser security configurations

deliverables.title: CIS 10 - Malware Defenses
deliverables.description: Test malware defenses and endpoint protection

deliverables.title: CIS 11 - Data Recovery
deliverables.description: Test data recovery capabilities and backup verification

deliverables.title: CIS 12 - Network Infrastructure Management
deliverables.description: Test network device configurations and security
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%network%' OR title LIKE '%firewall%' OR title LIKE '%router%'

deliverables.title: CIS 13 - Network Monitoring and Defense
deliverables.description: Test network monitoring and intrusion detection

deliverables.title: CIS 14 - Security Awareness Training
deliverables.description: Assess security awareness through social engineering tests

deliverables.title: CIS 15 - Service Provider Management
deliverables.description: Test security of service provider integrations

deliverables.title: CIS 16 - Application Software Security
deliverables.description: Test application security controls and secure development
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE title LIKE '%application%' OR title LIKE '%web%'

deliverables.title: CIS 17 - Incident Response Management
deliverables.description: Test incident response procedures and capabilities

deliverables.title: CIS 18 - Penetration Testing
deliverables.description: Perform regular penetration tests to validate controls
deliverables.validation_query: SELECT COUNT(*) as count FROM findings WHERE severity IN ('critical', 'high')
